attributes.action: Reduce tax on petral and an increase of tax unhealth food
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to reduce tax on petrol as it is such a nessesery item and causes great inflation in just about everything else as we have seen. The tax lost sould be made up by the increase of tax on unhealthy foods as this would bring down the amount obease
people in the country and stop inflation.
